${modID}:TheMoonlightSonata.NAME: Moonlight Sonata

${modID}:MasqueradeRhapsodyRequest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Every time a card is togawasakikomod:Purge during battle, this card's damage permanently increases by !M!.

${modID}:SoraNoMusica.NAME: Sora no Musica

${modID}:PerdereOmnia.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, togawasakikomod:Purge the next !M! cards you draw that is Unplayable then draw a card.

${modID}:ImprisonedXII.NAME: Imprisoned XII

${modID}:Kao.NAME: Kao
${modID}:Kao.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever an enemy gains a buff, increase this card's value by !M!.

${modID}:DarkHeaven.NAME: Dark Heaven
${modID}:DarkHeaven.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Strength, steal !M! Strength.

${modID}:Angles.NAME: Angles
${modID}:Angles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL You and the enemy gain !M! togawasakikomod:God's_Creation. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Utopia.NAME: Utopia
${modID}:Utopia.DESCRIPTION: Make the enemy lose !M! HP. NL When this card is togawasakikomod:Purge during battle, play this card instead.

${modID}:Daten.NAME: Daten
${modID}:Daten.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random cards from your deck to togawasakikomod:Purge. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MementoMori.NAME: MementoMori

${modID}:MementoMori.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL togawasakikomod:Purge the top 7 cards from the draw pile. NL Enter Divinity.

${modID}:TwoMoons.NAME: Two Moons
${modID}:TwoMoons.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have togawasakikomod:Dazzling, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:BlackBirthday.NAME: Black Birthday
${modID}:BlackBirthday.DESCRIPTION: Remove all buffs. NL For each type of buff removed, deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:IWantToBeYourGod.NAME: I Want to Be Your God

${modID}:Kings.NAME: Kings
${modID}:Kings.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduces the number of card rewards available for selection by 1 after this battle.

${modID}:SymbolIFire.NAME: Symbol I: Fire
${modID}:SymbolIFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Play the previous attack card that is not *Symbol *I: *Fire !M! times. NL Add a *Timoris to your deck.

${modID}:SymbolIIAir.NAME: Symbol II: Air
${modID}:SymbolIIAir.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Add a *Amoris to your deck.

${modID}:SymbolIVEarth.NAME: Symbol IV: Earth
${modID}:SymbolIVEarth.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal damage equal to your Block. NL Add a *Mortis to your deck.

${modID}:Ether.NAME: Ether
${modID}:Ether.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all non-Attack cards from your draw pile. NL Deal !D! damage for each Exhausted card. NL Add a *Oblivionis to your deck.

${modID}:ChoirSChoir.NAME: Choir 'S' Choir
${modID}:ChoirSChoir.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage three times. NL For each *Desire played, reduce this card's cost by 1 [E].

${modID}:PhantomOfSakiko.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage three times. NL Add a *Radiance to your deck. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PhantomOfMutsumi.NAME: Phantom of Mutsumi

${modID}:PhantomOfTaki.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Ideal+ to your deck. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:AveMujica.NAME: Ave Mujica
${modID}:AveMujica.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 togawasakikomod:Symbol cards to add to your deck and play it. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:AveMujica.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 upgraded togawasakikomod:Symbol cards to add to your deck and play it. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RhinocerosBeetle.NAME: Rhinoceros Beetle
${modID}:RhinocerosBeetle.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block. NL This card's Block scales with half the togawasakikomod:Dazzling instead of Dexterity.

${modID}:NeverGiveYouUp.NAME: Never Give You Up
${modID}:NeverGiveYouUp.DESCRIPTION: Return a card from your discard pile to your hand and make it togawasakikomod:Unremoveable. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CountingStars.NAME: Counting Stars
${modID}:CountingStars.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 [E] next turn. NL Gain !M! togawasakikomod:Dazzling for each type of buff you have.

${modID}:StayElegance.NAME: Stay Elegant
${modID}:StayElegance.DESCRIPTION: Gain a random potion. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:EdgeOfBreakdown.NAME: Edge of Breakdown
${modID}:EdgeOfBreakdown.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your discard pile and togawasakikomod:Purge it. NL Gain !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:OurSong.NAME: Our Song
${modID}:OurSong.DESCRIPTION: The next Attack card you play this turn grants you Block equal to the unblocked damage dealt.

${modID}:Masks.NAME: Masks
${modID}:Masks.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! togawasakikomod:Dazzling. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Replace a card in your hand into a copy of this card.
${modID}:Masks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Lose !M! togawasakikomod:Dazzling. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Replace a card in your hand into a copy of this card.

${modID}:AreTheseLyrics.DESCRIPTION: Discard all non-Attack cards. NL For each discarded card, add a *Melody to your deck.
${modID}:AreTheseLyrics.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard all non-Attack cards. NL For each discarded card, add a *Melody+ to your deck.

EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This card must be my only #bskill card!

${modID}:Veritas.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Whenever you Exhaust cards, add this card back to your hand.

${modID}:Carefree.NAME: Carefree

${modID}:WhiteKeys.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! togawasakikomod:Dazzling. NL The enemy gains !M! Strength.

${modID}:AsYourHeartDesires.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand, add a copy of the card to your deck. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DesuWa.NAME: Desuwa

${modID}:QuaerereLumina.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Gain Block equal to the number of cards discarded.

${modID}:BudgetBento.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen. NL Add an *Tiredness to your deck. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HeartsBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your deck.
${modID}:HeartsBarrier.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your deck.

${modID}:Passion.NAME: Passion
${modID}:Passion.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack deals !M! additional damage.

${modID}:Accomplice.NAME: Accomplice
${modID}:Accomplice.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Desire to your hand. NL All *Desire in your hand cost 0 energy this turn.

${modID}:AleaIactaEst.NAME: Alea Iacta Est

${modID}:AleaIactaEst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards for the rest of combat. NL Cannot draw cards this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:AuthorityRestoration.NAME: Authority Restoration
${modID}:AuthorityRestoration.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Artifact from everyone. NL You gain equal number of +!M! togawasakikomod:Hype and Block. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SpringSunlight.NAME: Spring Sunlight
${modID}:SpringSunlight.DESCRIPTION: Increase energy cost by 1 [E] for every !M! cards in your deck. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:SharedDestiny.NAME: Shared Destiny
${modID}:SharedDestiny.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain a new type of buff, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Endurance.NAME: Endurance
${modID}:Endurance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you add or togawasakikomod:Purge a card from your deck, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:SeizeTheFate.NAME: Seize the Fate
${modID}:SeizeTheFate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! togawasakikomod:Hype. NL Permanently decrease this card's togawasakikomod:Hype by 1.
${modID}:SeizeTheFate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! togawasakikomod:Hype. NL Permanently decrease this card's togawasakikomod:Hype by 1.

${modID}:Cruelty.NAME: Cruelty
${modID}:Cruelty.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vulnerable. NL Whenever you play *Desire, draw 2 cards.

${modID}:Pride.NAME: Pride
${modID}:Pride.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Draw !M! random Attack card. NL At the end of your turn, add a copy of this card to the top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:WishYouGoodLuck.NAME: Wish You Good Luck
${modID}:WishYouGoodLuck.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked but take no damage, gain !M! Thorns.

${modID}:CharismaticForm.NAME: Charismatic Form
${modID}:CharismaticForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy gains a buff, you gain it as well. NL Apply !M! togawasakikomod:Hype to all enemies.
${modID}:CharismaticForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever an enemy gains a buff, you gain it as well. NL Apply !M! togawasakikomod:Hype to all enemies.

${modID}:Crychic.NAME: Crychic

${modID}:Crychic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X+1 random togawasakikomod:Phantoms to your hand. They cost 0 energy this battle. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Worldview.NAME: Worldview

${modID}:Worldview.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you draw an unplayable card, repalce it with a random Attack card.

${modID}:Fearless.NAME: Fearless
${modID}:Fearless.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the next !M! turns, choose and togawasakikomod:Purge a card from your hand.

${modID}:Ideal.NAME: Ideal
${modID}:Ideal.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! Attack cards cost 0 energy.

${modID}:Curiosity.NAME: Curiosity
${modID}:Curiosity.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a power card, gain 1 Strength.

${modID}:Kindness.NAME: Kindness
${modID}:Kindness.DESCRIPTION: Regain all buffs lost since the last turn.

${modID}:Timoris.NAME: Timoris
${modID}:Timoris.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card remains in your hand at the end of the turn, gain 1 Vulnerable at the start of the next turn.

${modID}:Mortis.NAME: Mortis
${modID}:Mortis.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card remains in your hand at the end of the turn, add 1 *Injury to your draw pile each time you take damage this turn.

${modID}:Oblivionis.NAME: Oblivion
${modID}:Oblivionis.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in your hand, any Attack cards you played are Exhausted.

${modID}:Doloris.NAME: Doloris
${modID}:Doloris.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card remains in your hand at the end of the turn, take !M! damage.

${modID}:Weakness.NAME: Weakness
${modID}:Weakness.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Start each combat with this card in your discard pile.
